name: SimpleTools
signal_source: Privacy research shows 'top Android apps require 11 dangerous permissions on average' with users seeking 'less invasive options'
description: Collection of essential utility functions that work completely offline without requesting any device permissions
target_user: Privacy-conscious users frustrated with permission-heavy apps who need basic tools without data collection
pain_point_evidence: Users avoid apps when 'a beauty app asks access to your phone's microphone' and seek tools that don't 'compromise your privacy and expose sensitive data'
differentiation: Zero permissions vs. permission-heavy utilities, privacy-first design from ground up
subscription_fit: Premium includes expanded utility library and priority feature development

pricing.trial_strategy: Free core utilities, premium for expanded toolkit and advanced features
